example.title: Code listing: printing a stack trace
example.programlisting: Debug backtrace: @ YDFSFile.php:30 -- trigger_error(...) @ fsimage.php:44 -- ydfsfile->ydfsfile(...) @ fsimage.php -- fsimage->actiondefault() @ YDRequest.php:229 -- call_user_func(...) @ YDExecutor.php:81 -- fsimage->process() @ YDF2_process.php:19 -- ydexecutor->execute() @ fsimage.php:69 -- require_once(...)
